definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: Stone I dare see woman killer body shape is so flexible, in the heart had a surprised.
sentences.chinese: 石敢當見女殺手身形如此靈活，心中吃了一驚。

sentences.english: Acamouflaged shape moving through the sun-dappled shadows.
sentences.chinese: 一個保護色的身形在陽光斑駁的陰影中移動。

sentences.english: Huge ravens in the courtyard added to the sad atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 中庭裏身形巨大的渡鴉更添悲傷的氣氛。

sentences.english: In fact, mutant mice that have no circadian clocks tend to be chunky.
sentences.chinese: 比如無生物鐘的變種小鼠身形就趨於矮胖。

sentences.english: She was waiting for us, her figure defined by the light from the half-opened door.
sentences.chinese: 她等着我們，半開的門裏透出光亮，顯出她的身形。

sentences.english: He caught sight of an enormous orc, dressed in a full suit of black plate armor .
sentences.chinese: 他看到一個身形巨大的獸人，穿着全身一套黑色板甲。

sentences.english: His huge, light shape devoured the black ill.
sentences.chinese: 他龐然璀璨的身形吞噬着黑幽幽的山丘。

sentences.english: The horse figure, Tang Dynasty. The horse body almost move at next second.
sentences.chinese: 唐朝的馬俑造型豐膩肥美，身形生動逼真動態十足。

sentences.english: Yet bird skeletons don’t actually weigh any less than the skeletons of similarly sized mammals.
sentences.chinese: 然而它們的重量卻並不比同樣身形哺乳動物的骨胳輕。

sentences.english: And though death may hide me, and the greater silence enfold me.
sentences.chinese: 即使死神將我的身形藏匿，更浩瀚的靜寂將我包圍。

sentences.english: Ladies practice can achieve the effect of body size shape and skin maintenance.
sentences.chinese: 女士習練可以達到身形塑造和皮膚保養的效果。

sentences.english: Dugs are slender, powerfully-built beings with a somewhat humanoid build and a unique method of walking.
sentences.chinese: 達格人強壯有力但身形苗條，體形略具人形。

sentences.english: Though he is a little fat, he runs as fast as an arrow.
sentences.chinese: 雖然他看起來身形有些胖，但跑起來猶如離弦之箭。

sentences.english: His girlfriend, tall and thin with her hair in long bangs, clearly recognized Mr.
sentences.chinese: 對方的女友身形瘦高，劉海兒很長。

sentences.english: Now and then we wake to watch the gentle sweep of the Southern Cross through the sky.
sentences.chinese: 我們間或醒來凝視星空中南十字星的曼妙身形。

sentences.english: This is the best way to lose weight and remain healthy.
sentences.chinese: 這也是減肥和保持身形最好的方法。
